name: Joe's Marble-less Adventure
description:
Controls:

Move  -  Arrow Keys

Run  -  Left Shift

Attack  -  A

Block  -  D

This is my submission for the WeekSauce February 2023 jam. I didn't get nearly as much done as I would've liked, so I might continue this at some point or recycle it into a future project.

This is supposedly a game about a guy called Joe, who has been reliably informed that he has lost his marbles. However, Joe NEVER loses! Therefore they must have been stolen! Joe must now brawl his way through all sorts of characters (Currently: 4 janky clones) in the search for his missing marbles - Where in the World are they?!

Credit for the sprites goes to 'GamesForTutti' as I downloaded their asset pack from the Unity Store.
